definition: an activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent
details:
noun
- an activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent
- the act of representing
- a creation that is a visual or tangible rendering of someone or something
- the right of being represented by delegates who have a voice in some legislative body
- a presentation to the mind in the form of an idea or image
= synonyms: mental representation, internal representation
- a statement of facts and reasons made in appealing or protesting
= example: a statement of facts and reasons made in appealing or protesting
- a performance of a play
= synonyms: theatrical, theatrical performance, histrionics
- a factual statement made by one party in order to induce another party to enter into a contract
= example: a factual statement made by one party in order to induce another party to enter into a contract
- a body of legislators that serve in behalf of some constituency
= example: a body of legislators that serve in behalf of some constituency
- the state of serving as an official and authorized delegate or agent
= synonyms: delegacy
